reviewText: Nothing beats Mr. Bean for family amusement.  Atkinson is the biggest comedy genius - every facial expression, every muttered word is hilarious.  I particularly love the episodes with his teddy bear.  One of the best characters ever invented - part naive child, part mean-streak.
Funny! I grew up watching this on HBO and I enjoy watching every episode. He is hilarious! Classic original comedy
really funny movie, mr. bean's movies are great for the whole famil. I liked that it was his best episodes
The Best of Mr Bean vol. 2 is so funny! We can just laugh for hours watching Mr. Bean. He does so many things that other people wouldn't do ;)
come on , it's mr. bean!  LOVE LOVE LOVE it!!!  Always good laughs, even watched multiple times.  you won't regret it.

Bean is timeless
Look and see for yourself
His Christmas shopping trip was and is the most original skit you will see
A lot of fun, made a good evening of laughter ; to be recommended for an evening of fun with the family .
He may not talk but he can sure make one laugh. Mr Bean's Holiday was a great. 5 Stars + for Mr Bean
If you liked the 1st Mr. Bean movie (the art gallery), you will find this Absolutely HILARIOUS and great entertainment !!
What can I say, It's Mr. Bean. If you like Bean, you won't be disappointed.
Good childhood memories!!!
Great family movie night
When I get homesick, this is sure to make my blues go away!
Good deal!!
Great
LOVE Mr. Bean! He's a comedic genius

Meh, it was alright...his best was when he went on vacation~LOVED that one...anytime I get
stressed out, watch that silly flick & all worries vanish.
However I sure wish he still made these movies and not
"decide to grow up at 50"...what a pity.
